to tell someone off, to scold
to be angular, to be square
intense antipathy (like a blazing fire), flames of rage
the three kilesas that poison the heart of man (greed, hatred and delusion)

sdata.e: He's not beaten by the rain; he's not beaten by the wind; neither the snow nor the heat of the summer will beat him; his body is robust, without greed; he never angers, but is always serenely smiling.
